text:
Chapter 5

Floodwater was cleared by using 470 Pump sets, 82 JCBs and Poclain trucks, 49 Fire
service machines and 75 super suckers of CMWSSB (GCC, 2017).ln addition, 6 heavy-
duty pumps having a capacity of 250 HP each supplied by Confederation of Indian
Industry (CII), New Delhi and 4 from Neyveli Lignite Corporation Ltd.(NLC) were
used in heavy waterlogged areas (GCC, 2017). The relief materials were supplied by
boats and choppers in the low-lying areas of the city.
